page.title: 13Allerdale District Council
page.content: One Wednesday morning, Mr Norris, Chief Engineer for Allerdale District Council, came to our school assembly to talk to us about his work. He is responsible for: {The Parks:}The planting of flowers and trees. {Housing:}The maintenance and repair of Council houses. {Sewage:}The maintenance and repair of drains and underground sewers, some of which are over 4 feet in diameter. {Streets:}The fitting of street names, the cleaning of streets and repairs to the road, pavements and street lighting. {Employees and Machinery:}Mr Norris has over 300 men working in his department who use a variety of heavy plant and machinery.
